languages.text: "Мне будет его не хватать. Надеюсь, не посрамлю его память и смогу нести слово святого Друза нуждающимся в искуплении хоть в половину так же рьяно".

traits.locale_text: "Так или иначе, мне будет его не хватать. Надеюсь, что, возглавив миссию, я не посрамлю его память, и смогу нести слово святого Друза нуждающимся в искуплении хоть в половину также рьяно".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "I'm going to miss him. I hope I can live up to his memory and be at least half as fervent as him in bringing Saint Drusus's word to those in need of redemption."
languages.original_text: "Мне будет его не хватать. Надеюсь, не посрамлю его память и смогу нести слово святого Друза нуждающимся в искуплении хоть в половину так же рьяно".

traits.locale_text: "I'm going to miss him. I hope I can live up to his memory and be at least half as fervent as him in bringing Saint Drusus's word to those in need of redemption."

languages.text: “我会想念他的。我希望我不要辜负他的期望，至少能像他那样热心，把圣德鲁苏斯的教诲带给那些需要救赎的人。”
languages.original_text: "I'm going to miss him. I hope I can live up to his memory and be at least half as fervent as him in bringing Saint Drusus's word to those in need of redemption."

traits.locale_text: “我会想念他的。我希望我不要辜负他的期望，至少能像他那样热心，把圣德鲁苏斯的教诲带给那些需要救赎的人。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「会えなくて寂しくなります。彼の記憶の中で生き続けて、少なくとも彼の半分の熱意は持てるようになりたい。そして、贖罪を求めている者達に、聖ドルススの言葉を伝えたいです」
languages.original_text: "I'm going to miss him. I hope I can live up to his memory and be at least half as fervent as him in bringing Saint Drusus's word to those in need of redemption."

traits.locale_text: 「会えなくて寂しくなります。彼の記憶の中で生き続けて、少なくとも彼の半分の熱意は持てるようになりたい。そして、贖罪を求めている者達に、聖ドルススの言葉を伝えたいです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Voy a echarle de menos. Espero honrar su memoria y ser al menos la mitad de vehemente a la hora de hacer llegar las palabras de san Drusus a aquellos en necesidad de redención».
languages.original_text: "I'm going to miss him. I hope I can live up to his memory and be at least half as fervent as him in bringing Saint Drusus's word to those in need of redemption."

traits.locale_text: «Voy a echarle de menos. Espero honrar su memoria y ser al menos la mitad de vehemente a la hora de hacer llegar las palabras de san Drusus a aquellos en necesidad de redención».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich werde ihn vermissen. Ich hoffe, ich kann seinem Andenken gerecht werden und nur halb so leidenschaftlich wie er das Wort des Heiligen Drusus unter allen verbreiten, die der Erlösung bedürfen."
languages.original_text: "I'm going to miss him. I hope I can live up to his memory and be at least half as fervent as him in bringing Saint Drusus's word to those in need of redemption."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde ihn vermissen. Ich hoffe, ich kann seinem Andenken gerecht werden und nur halb so leidenschaftlich wie er das Wort des Heiligen Drusus unter allen verbreiten, die der Erlösung bedürfen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Il va me manquer. J'espère être à la hauteur de son héritage et transmettre aussi fervemment que lui la parole de Saint Drusus à ceux qui cherchent la rédemption. »
languages.original_text: "I'm going to miss him. I hope I can live up to his memory and be at least half as fervent as him in bringing Saint Drusus's word to those in need of redemption."

traits.locale_text: « Il va me manquer. J'espère être à la hauteur de son héritage et transmettre aussi fervemment que lui la parole de Saint Drusus à ceux qui cherchent la rédemption. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Onu özleyeceğim. Umarım onun hatırasına layık bir şekilde yaşayabilir, kefaret peşindekilere Aziz Drusus'un kelamını ulaştırmak konusunda onun yarısı kadar tutkulu olabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I'm going to miss him. I hope I can live up to his memory and be at least half as fervent as him in bringing Saint Drusus's word to those in need of redemption."

traits.locale_text: "Onu özleyeceğim. Umarım onun hatırasına layık bir şekilde yaşayabilirim ve umarım kefaret peşindekilere Aziz Drusus'un kelamını ulaştırmak konusunda onun yarısı kadar tutkulu olabilirim."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
